settings.title: Settings

settings.supportFeedback.helpSupportMess: Get help and support for the app.
settings.supportFeedback.rateAppMessage: Would you like to rate the app?
settings.supportFeedback.helpSupportDesc: Browse guides, FAQs, and contact options to get help with the app.
settings.supportFeedback.sendFeedbackDes: Share ideas, report bugs, or suggest improvements directly to our team.
settings.supportFeedback.rateAppDesc: Leave a review in the app store to help others discover Mention.
settings.inviteContacts.inviteBannerSubt: Share Mention with people you know
settings.inviteContacts.shareMessage: Hey! {{name}} invited you to join Mention - a new social platform where conversations matter. Join me at {{url}}
settings.inviteContacts.shareMessageWith: Hey! {{name}} (@{{handle}}) invited you to join Mention - a new social platform where conversations matter. Join me at {{url}}
settings.inviteContacts.title: Invite Contacts
settings.inviteContacts.description: Invite your contacts to join Mention.
settings.inviteContacts.permissionMessag: We need access to your contacts to help you invite friends to Mention. Your contacts are never stored on our servers.
settings.inviteContacts.permissionDenied: To invite contacts, please grant access to your contacts in Settings.
settings.inviteContacts.permissionError: Failed to request contacts permission. Please try again.
settings.inviteContacts.notAvailableMess: Contact invitations are only available on iOS and Android devices.
settings.inviteContacts.loadError: Failed to load contacts. Please try again.
settings.inviteContacts.noContactsDesc: Make sure your contacts have phone numbers or email addresses.
settings.inviteContacts.inviteMessage: invited you to join Mention! Check it out:
settings.inviteContacts.inviteError: Failed to send invitations. Please try again.
settings.inviteContacts.noSelectionMessa: Please select at least one contact to invite.
settings.privacy.title: Privacy
settings.privacy.description: Control who can see your content and interact with you
settings.privacy.publicDescription: Anyone can see your posts and follow you
settings.privacy.followersOnlyDescriptio: Only your followers can see your posts
settings.privacy.privateDescription: Only approved followers can see your posts
settings.privacy.hideAllCountsDesc: Hide all engagement counts and save button on posts
settings.privacy.hideLikeCountsDesc: Hide the number of likes on your posts
settings.privacy.hideShareCountsDesc: Hide the number of shares on your posts
settings.privacy.hideReplyCountsDesc: Hide the number of replies on posts
settings.privacy.hideSaveCountsDesc: Hide the save button on posts
settings.privacy.allowTagsDesc: Let others tag you in posts
settings.privacy.allowMentionsDesc: Let others mention you in posts
settings.privacy.showOnlineStatusDesc: Show when you're online to others
settings.privacy.unblockUserConfirm: Are you sure you want to unblock this user?
settings.privacy.unrestrictUserConfirm: Are you sure you want to unrestrict this user?
settings.privacy.restrictedUsersDescript: Restricted users can see your posts but have limited interaction. They cannot see when you're online or comment on your posts.
settings.preferences.appearanceDesc: Customize theme, colors, and display settings
settings.profileCustomization.title: Profile Customization
settings.profileCustomization.coverPhoto: Show or hide cover photo on your profile
settings.profileCustomization.minimalist: Use a clean, minimalist profile layout
settings.profileCustomization.info: These settings only affect how your profile appears to you. Other users will see your profile based on their own preferences.
settings.preferences.offlineModeDesc: Limit data usage and work offline.
settings.feed.title: Feed Settings
settings.feed.description: Customize how your feed is ranked and displayed
settings.feed.saveError: Failed to save feed settings. Please try again.
settings.feed.diversity.title: Diversity
settings.feed.diversity.enabledDesc: Mix content from different authors and topics to avoid echo chambers
settings.feed.diversity.sameAuthorPenalt: Reduce score for posts from authors you've seen recently (0.5 = strong penalty, 1.0 = no penalty)
settings.feed.diversity.sameTopicPenalty: Reduce score for posts with topics you've seen recently (0.5 = strong penalty, 1.0 = no penalty)
settings.feed.diversity.maxConsecutiveSa: Maximum number of posts from the same author in a row (1-10)
settings.feed.recency.title: Recency
settings.feed.recency.halfLifeHoursDesc: Hours after which a post loses 50% of its recency score (6-72 hours)
settings.feed.recency.maxAgeHoursDesc: Maximum age in hours before a post is excluded from feed (24-336 hours)
settings.feed.quality.title: Quality
settings.feed.quality.boostHighQualityDe: Prioritize posts with high engagement rates
settings.feed.presets.title: Quick Presets
settings.feed.presets.balancedDesc: Balanced mix of recent and engaging content
settings.feed.presets.diverseDesc: Maximum diversity from different authors and topics
settings.feed.resetToDefaultsMessage: Reset all feed settings to their default values?
settings.feed.help.diversity.title: Diversity Settings
settings.feed.help.diversity.message: Diversity settings help prevent echo chambers by mixing content from different authors and topics. Lower penalty values mean more diversity in your feed.
settings.feed.help.recency.title: Recency Settings
settings.feed.help.recency.message: Recency settings control how quickly posts lose relevance over time. Half-life is when a post loses 50% of its recency score. Max age is when posts are excluded from your feed.
settings.feed.help.quality.title: Quality Settings
settings.feed.help.quality.message: Quality settings prioritize posts with high engagement rates, meaning posts that get more likes, comments, and reposts relative to their views.
settings.quickActions.createPostDesc: Share your thoughts and ideas with the community.
settings.quickActions.searchDesc: Find users, posts, hashtags, and more.
settings.quickActions.exploreDesc: Discover trending topics and popular posts.
settings.data.clearCacheDesc: Clear cached data to free space.
settings.data.clearCacheMessage: This will clear cached files and data.
settings.data.resetPersonalizationDesc: Clear all your feed personalization data and start fresh
settings.data.resetPersonalizationMessag:
This will clear all your feed preferences, including:

â€¢ Author preferences
â€¢ Topic interests
â€¢ Post type preferences
â€¢ Active hours and language preferences

Your feed will start learning your preferences again from scratch. This action cannot be undone.
settings.data.resetPersonalizationSucces: Your personalization data has been reset successfully. Your feed will start learning your preferences again.
settings.data.resetPersonalizationError: Failed to reset personalization data. Please try again.
settings.data.linkManagementDesc: Manage cached link previews and images
settings.links.title: Link Management
settings.links.clearAllCacheDesc: Clear all cached link metadata and images
settings.links.clearAllCacheMessage: This will clear all cached link previews and images. Links will be fetched fresh when viewed again.
settings.links.clearAllCacheError: Failed to clear cache. Please try again.
settings.links.refreshLinkDesc: Force refresh metadata and image for a specific URL
settings.links.urlRequired: Please enter a URL to refresh
settings.links.refreshLinkSuccess: Link refreshed successfully. New metadata and images will be fetched when viewed.
settings.links.refreshLinkError: Failed to refresh link. Please try again.
settings.links.rateLimitExceeded: Too many requests. Please wait a moment before trying again.
compose.noDraftsDescription: Your saved drafts will appear here
compose.deleteDraftConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this draft?

permission.notifications.subtitle: Enable notifications to get updates when people you follow post.
